Title: Relates to requiring the forbearance of residential mortgage payments for any mortgagor who demonstrates financial hardship as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Requires the forbearance of residential mortgage payments for any mortgagor who demonstrates financial hardship as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic for one year.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring the forbearance of residential mortgage payments for any mortgagor who demonstrates financial hardship as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic
